channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Europe’s EV Monopoly Requires Cheaper, Smaller Mass Market Vehicles
item.description: Europe's plan for an EV monopoly requires tiny electric cars to create a mass market and that means concessions on safety, comfort and style.

item.title: Business leaders are growing more optimistic, JPMorgan survey finds
item.description: Almost two in five leaders at midsize businesses expressed optimism—especially about their own company’s future performance.

item.title: The curveball questions CEOs are asking job seekers amid Gen Z’s hiring nightmare: ‘Design a car for a deaf person’
item.description: Gen Z’s hiring nightmare is real. With fewer jobs and fiercer competition, employers are using curveball interview questions to separate candidates fr...

item.title: How JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon notched $770 million in gains for his work in 2025
item.description: Dimon has accumulated a lot of equity through his compensation plan, personal purchases, and via a 2021 special award.

item.title: Harman Kardon Launches New SoundSticks 5 With Wi-Fi And A Striking Light Show
item.description: It's over a quarter of a century since Harman Kardon wowed the world with its SoundSticks speakers which launched at one of Steve Jobs' legendary keyn...

item.title: The most honest prediction for 2026: nobody knows what’s next
item.description: To my fellow CEOs: stop chasing certainty. Stop waiting for perfect information. Stop anchoring decisions to forecasts that will never be stable.

item.title: Jollibee shares surge after the Filipino fried chicken chain says it’ll spin off its ‘higher-growth but more volatile’ global business
item.description: Jollibee is pursuing an aggressive global expansion, as it tries to grow beyond its profitable Filipino market.

item.title: 9 Excellent Big Games From 2025 That You Might’ve Missed
item.description: Some of 2025's finest games may have passed you by. Here's a guide to nine that could've dropped off your list, but you really should try out.

item.title: China Drafts New Laws Covering AI And Mental Health That Spurs International Interest
item.description: China has proposed a new set of AI laws. I examine portions pertaining to human mental health. Some intriguing aspects arise. An AI Insider scoop.

item.title: Audio-Technica Announces Its New AT-LP7X Vinyl Turntable In Time For CES 2026
item.description: The new Audio-Technica AT-LP7X is a fully manual belt-drive turntable designed for vinyl enthusiasts who want precision engineering combined with mini...

item.title: Why Hyundai stock soared 14% in Seoul action
Trump says Venezuela will send U.S. up to 50 million barrels of oil
Index rebalancing may interrupt gold and silver parabolic run
Metals rally lifts gold-to-oil rally to new heights as silver surpasses Nvidia
In a rarity, S&P 500 and VIX just posted gains on the same day. Here’s why.
Defense spending could rise following US arrest of Venezuela's Maduro, analyst says
item.description: The Trump administration's arrest of Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro could lead to an increase in defense spending as the White House looks to counte...

item.title: Iconic children's toy brand goes high-tech to bring creations 'to life' without screens
item.description: LEGO introduces revolutionary screen-free SMART Play technology at CES 2026, bringing interactive sounds and lights to physical builds.

item.title: Texas, Florida again top U-Haul 'Growth Index'
item.description: Texas, Florida and other southern states are the places in the U.S. where people moved to the most in 2025, according to U-Haul's latest "Growth Index...

item.title: Maduro's removal could reverse decades of economic struggles for Venezuelans
item.description: The arrest of Nicolás Maduro in a U.S. raid could bring relief to average Venezuelans after decades of economic mismanagement led to rampant inflation...

item.title: Maduro’s capture puts Cuba’s Venezuelan oil-dependent economy at risk
item.description: The U.S. military captures Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, threatening Cuba's economy as the nation loses a key provider of oil supplies for communi...

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
